name: Patterns
description: A list of all the patterns in the mod. Ideally, I would have to go on quests to the dungeons and ancient libraries of the world to discover these. However, a strange force guides my hand calling itself the "mod developer," raving the strangest things about how she "wants to get the mod out already" and "is sick of typing JSON" and "wonders how many levels of fourth-wall breaking we're on."
